resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/77526</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>77526</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>SDT</catalog>
            <entry>ed31b03e-61bc-46b7-9cfe-8a418108fcb8#1#2</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="hu">Emese</string>
            <string language="en">Emese</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Emese</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Emese</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Emese</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Emese</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Emese</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Emese</string>
          </title>
          <language>hu</language>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">Emese álma</string>
            <string language="en">Dream of Emese</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu">feltételezett magyar őshaza,  Magna Hungária,  a magyar nép vándorlása,  hun-magyar eredet,  Hun Birodalom,  finnugor törzsek,  szavárd magyarok,  török népek,  erdős és füves puszta,  totemizmus,  Emese,  </string>
            <string language="en">presumed hungarian original home, migration of Hungarian folk, genuine hun-hungarian, Empire of Hun, Finno-Ugric tribes, sabir hungarians, turkish folk, woody and grassy plain, totemism, Emese</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Traum von Emese</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Rêve d'Emese</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Sonho de Emese</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Sogno di Emese</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Όνειρο Emese</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Sueño de Emese</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">vorausgesetztes ungarisches ursprüngliches Haus, 
Migration der ungarischen Völker, echtes Hunne-ungarisches, Reich der
Hunne-, Finno-Ugricstämme, der sabir Ungarn, der türkischen Volk-, 
waldigen und grasartigenebene, totemism, Emese</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">maison initiale hongroise présumée, transfert des gens
hongrois, hun-hongrois véritable, empire des tribus d'hun, de 
Finno-Ugric, des Hongrois de sabir, de plaine de gens, boisée et 
herbeuse turque, totemism, Emese</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">HOME original hungarian presumida, migração de povos 
hungarian, hun-hun-hungarian genuíno, império de tribes do hun, do 
Finno-Ugric, de hungarians do sabir, da planície turkish dos povos, a
woody e a gramínea, totemism, Emese</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">sede originale ungherese presunta, espansione della 
gente ungherese, hun-ungherese genuino, impero delle tribù di 
Finno-Ugric, del hun, degli ungheresi del sabir, della pianura boscosa
e grassy turca della gente, totemism, Emese</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">θεωρούμενο ουγγρικό αρχικό σπίτι, μετανάστευση των 
ουγγρικών λαϊκών, γνήσιων χuν-ουγγρικών, της αυτοκρατορίας 
Hun, των φινλανδοουγγρικών φυλών, sabir Ούγγρων, της 
τουρκικής λαϊκής, ξύλινης και χλοώδους πεδιάδας, τοτεμισμός, 
Emese</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">hogar original húngaro presumido, migración de la 
gente húngara, hun-hu'ngaro genuino, imperio de las tribus del hun, 
de Finno-Ugric, de los húngaros del sabir, del llano turco de la 
gente, arbolado y herboso, totemism, Emese</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <educational>
          <learningResourceType>
            <source>LRE.learningResourceTypeValues</source>
            <value>image</value>
          </learningResourceType>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <cost>
            <source>costValues</source>
            <value>no</value>
          </cost>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">A tartalom kizárólag kizárólag az oktatás illetve tudományos kutatás céljára használható szigorúan non-profit jelleggel.</string>
            <string language="en">The content may be used for the sole purpose of illustration for teaching or scientific research and only for a strictly non-commercial purpose.</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
        <lifeCycle>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>roleValues</source>
              <value>publisher</value>
            </role>
            <entity>begin:vcard 
version:3.0
n:;
fn: 
org:BCSS Kft.
end:vcard</entity>
          </contribute>
        </lifeCycle>
        <classification>
          <purpose>
            <source>purposeValues</source>
            <value>discipline</value>
          </purpose>
          <taxonPath>
            <source>
              <string language="x-none">LRE-0001</string>
            </source>
            <taxon>
              <id>590</id>
            </taxon>
          </taxonPath>
        </classification>
        <metaMetadata>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>LRE.roleMetaValues</source>
              <value>provider</value>
            </role>
            <entity>begin:vcard
        org:Sulinet
        version:3.0
        end:vcard</entity>
          </contribute>
        </metaMetadata>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>

      <entry>77526</entry>

      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
